website_summaries.verdict: Choose this blender if simplicity and attractiveness are your top concerns; otherwise check the other members of the Oster blender family on our shortlist.
pros: Cooks who prefer an effortless model love the Beehive's 2-speed toggle switch that is super easy to use and ideal for smoothies, frozen drinks, soups, and more
cons: Consumers who use blenders for preparing numerous types of foods in various consistencies will likely miss having numerous settings and functions

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: My trusty old Oster broke so I got this as a replacement. I don't need a lot of settings, just something to blend smoothies and milkshakes. Sadly this model doesn't do as well as I hoped. I constantly have to stop blending and manually stir which gets annoying. Also the smell of the motor running makes me think it's burning up from running too long. I would not recommend this to anybody who wants to blend fruit , ice cream, or ice cubes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this at all.
customer_reviews.text: This did not work well from the day I opened it. I just tried to make a smoothie with celery, ice, yogurt and coffee. What I got was chunks of celery in my smoothie. If I try with spinach I get pieces of spinach floating around. It does not mix frozen fruit well either. I am very disappointed in this purchase. Wish I would have spent a few extra dollars on something that works!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Lo

customer_reviews.title: Dull blades, loud, and a smelly motor!
customer_reviews.text: This blender is horrible. I have used it for about a month and the blades are already dull. It is incredibly loud and the motor smells like it is working much harder than it should be. I have been using the blender for soups and smoothies. The last two things I made were a beet smoothie which was lumpy and a split pea soup that remained a little grainy despite the peas being well cooked and mushy before blending. I have had cheaper blenders in the past that worked better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: I love this basic  classic beehive blender
customer_reviews.text: It has only one speed. and can pulse by manually switching the pulse switch. Simple to use. It is more powerful than my old blender with lots of speeds. It also holds it's own against an old Vitamin, which I once had. I dumped my Vitamix because it had a stainless steel container that wouldn't go in dishwasher. This classic Oster does anything I want it to do. Crushes ice with ease and blends batters and fruit smoothies in seconds. Glass container and other parts (except rubber ring) go in the dishwasher with ease. I bought it half price because it was a return. When it came I saw it was brand new in the box. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The motor in the Oster blender I bought at a big bix store over 30 years ago finally burned up, and my addiction to smoothies could not go unaddressed. After considering more expensive blenders with fancy attachments, I decided on this retro looking Oster. I'm completely satisfied. It has the power I need to blend frozen fruit and is easy to clean. The cup and blender parts from my dead blender fit this, so I'm all set. Quality product, simple and looks great too
customer_reviews.author: Karuna

customer_reviews.title: Lousy
customer_reviews.text: This blender was horrible no power do not buy lousy product sent back
customer_reviews.author: Harrison

customer_reviews.title: No frills, just power
customer_reviews.text: This is a metal to metal direct drive machine that has power. Unlike many that I have had in the past, this machine will last because of the connection between motor and the jar. Quality manufacturing and durable housing on the base. This is a no frills powerful blender that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: You can't blend anything thats not completely liquid. Don't bother blending iced drinks or making pesto. Everything has to be completely liquid. It is also SO LOUD. I have 2 roommates and I have to wait for them to both be out of the house to use this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down ice and frozen fruit quickly
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and crushes ice. I'm using this for smoothies almost exclusively. It's perfect for my needs. I like the steel and metal combination because it washes easily and dries quickly. I also anticipate using this to blend soups. I don't need more speeds for those two purposes. At times if my mixture is particularly thick or has ingredients frozen together in a big chunk I have to stop and stir, but not an unreasonable amount. It performs much better than any blender I've ever owned, even a KitchenAid that required a lot more intervention to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: luxcursor

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the money spent!  Working well!
customer_reviews.text: For $ 40.00 or less this is a great machine. I got this one to make smoothies while on vacation. The glass container is excellent. The blending power is good. I had to be careful not to overwork the blender. At home I have a Vitamix ($450.00) and this is a far cry from that machine, but this one gets the job done, you just need to be gentle with the mixing. the vitamix comes with a plastic mixing container... the glass one is far better in that respect.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Duck

customer_reviews.title: Really bad design. Item should be recalled
customer_reviews.text: The glass jar wobbles. It does not sit securely on its base. Really bad design. Item should be recalled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended but really stinks
customer_reviews.text: This blender makes excellent smoothies if given enough liquid. The simple switch is a plus. Easy to clean. I took one star away due to the awful burning electrical smell that has not gone away with weeks of use. That just cannot bode well for the longevity of this handy little machine, but, so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ucantremember

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience :(
customer_reviews.text: I was already dis-satisfied with the product (1. this was by far the loudest blender I have ever heard - I'm surprised I wasn't getting complaints from the neighbors; 2. for a regular smoothie it didn't blend well as I had to dig at it and stir with a spoon), then the plastic piece that holds the blade at the bottom of the glass container broke in the dishwasher. Threw it away, don't want a replacement. My next blender will not be an Oster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: Seal broke on third use. Smells like electrical fire when I ran it.
customer_reviews.author: Him

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy base. Glass container cleans up nicely
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Has 2 modes...press down for pulse, flip up for continuous. The unit is very loud but the motor and blades are very strong so you don't have to use it for too long. Sturdy base. Glass container cleans up nicely. Other blade assemblies are available. Had to return the first unit because the plastic top was missing. The exchange was almost effortless (printed out the pre-paid label and dropped off at local office supply store). The replacement unit arrived before the original unit had been received. Excellent customer service. Gave 4 stars just because the unit is so loud.
customer_reviews.author: C Makoski

customer_reviews.title: Good and simple
customer_reviews.text: I remember as a kid looking at the blender and wondering why there was so many buttons.Well nothing as changed.This machine seems very well built and I think it will last me for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Metalman531

customer_reviews.title: Dented and real loud
customer_reviews.text: Came in dented plus it’s unleveled you have to hold it or I will walk and this thing is so loud you’ll need earplugs returning and going with ninja
customer_reviews.author: AZGuy86

customer_reviews.title: Works, but......
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace an El' Equip RPM blender. Like night and day. this blender left large pieces of ice and the bottom of the smoothies are think and top thin. The RPM blender was much more consistent. I'm not even sure we'll use this much. Attempting to repair the RPM since they no longer make that model and none of the newer blenders come close.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah G.

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, Noisy, Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Sounded like a jet engine going off in your ear. noise level was not worth the results. bought a Ninja instead. The noise level was so bad we just threw the thing away as we did not figure any one else wanted it either.
customer_reviews.author: Duane

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The product is very powerful. It only has two speeds , on one switch ... if your looking for something simple powerful and practical, this is the product for you! Im very satisfied withe the product... i make smoothies, salsas , and anything that needs to be liquified..
customer_reviews.author: Roger Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Good Blender
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying that I'm not a fan of those blenders with a million buttons. I mean, seriously, it's a blender. Give me one switch that I can press so it starts to blend. I like the simplicity of this design. The toggle switch is very intuitive. Toggle up for On. Middle is off. And press it down and it will stay on as long as you keep holding it down. It's easy to assemble/ disassemble for cleaning. Overall, quite satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Izzos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent malt maker!
customer_reviews.text: I also ordered the milkshake blade attachment. This is a grate (get it?!?) mixer. Unfortunately it is costing me a fortune in ice cream, as the family and all the kid's friends have decided a nightly ice cream malt is the perfect end to a summer day. They are quick and easy to make, and clean up is easy-peasy, but I should have bought stock in Blue Bell. I am buying 3-4 half gallons per week!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This blender works Great! With no rubber or plastic gears to burn up! I Highly Recommend this blender to anyone who enjoys frozen beverages.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Miller

customer_reviews.title: Loud and menacing
customer_reviews.text: It's a jet engine for the morning smoothie. Can't sleep when in use. Mate hates the noise. For me it's a second alarm to wake up. This thing would be a finger destroyer -- so a great deal of caution and noise canceling ear plugs is a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking for a blender that didn’t have all kinds of buttons on it and this is the one. This one works so well. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender at a good Price
customer_reviews.text: I drink a lot of green smoothies but couldn't afford a Bullet or Vitamix. After reading some reviews I took a chance on this blender. I like the simple operation and classic style. I wasn't sure it would hold up to by daily use of putting frozen fruit, greens and vegetables in it. So far it is working like a charm. Everything grinds up well and I have no left over chunks in my blender. I will say start will some liquid at the bottom and build your smoothies from there. I usually use water and almond milk. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aliza Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great blender. Happy that I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at least 3 years ago and it’s still rocking hard. Great power and extremely happy with this blender. Highly recommend to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Teo49ers

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably loud!!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably loud. My wife literally wears hearing protection when using it. Doesn't cycle frozen drinks enough to fully process all ice.
customer_reviews.author: BBD

customer_reviews.title: New six cup container WILL replace the old, all metal Osterizer 5 cup container.
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product, but I much prefer my newly 50 year old, all metal bee-hive osterizer. When the 5 cup glass container broke, I was told buy Oster that the new 6 cup container wouldn't fit. IT DOES. Not terrible;. A replacement container with lid would be about $30 compared to about $50 for the new unit. The new osterizer did very well making me smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Krystyna Jaffe-Loren

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: This blender works well, but is horribly loud. I live with my elderly mother and she actually leaves the room when I turn it on and I can't blame her. It also has a strong ozone scent though that may fade with time. As is, I'm not making my breakfast shakes like I used to because of the high pitched noise this makes. Guess I'll end up buying something else...
customer_reviews.author: C. Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Operation
customer_reviews.text: Owned an earlier version of this blender. Worked well for years. Looking forward for many years use from this purchase. I like the fact that it has off/on-pulse switch only. I only want blending. This product does that well.
customer_reviews.author: lelia ann owston

customer_reviews.title: Keeps on truckin'
customer_reviews.text: I brought this to make smoothies for my kids and it has not let us down. Equal parts frozen strawberries and blueberries plus a dollop of plain yogurt plus a dash of cinnamon. Cover with guava nectar. Smoothify. I hope you have access to guava nectar – it is smoothie magic!
customer_reviews.author: TL8

customer_reviews.title: Worked great while it lasted...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this blender in June 2019. Although it was very loud, it did a great job making my daily smoothies with frozen fruit and ice. Almost 6 months to the day of purchase, it died in December 2019. Started making a funny sound and then a burning smell so I immediately turned it off. Was nice while it lasted but I think a blender that says it will make 10,000 smoothies should last longer than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: Much more powerful than my last blender. This blender goes through ice super easy. I use it everyday and I found no faults with it.
customer_reviews.author: craig ballurio

customer_reviews.title: Works well but is really loud
customer_reviews.text: This blender blends well and is easy to take apart and clean. However, I had to dock it two stars because: 1) it is by far the loudest blender I've ever owned, and 2) the motor smells when it's on (it smells like it's working too hard and is going to burn out).
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Thought I would Love a smoothie?
customer_reviews.text: My last blender was basically for Margarita's and an occasional milkshake..otherwise it would just sit and look pretty on my counter, I started eating healthier and wanted to add smoothies into my diet and my old pretty blender had just sat as eye candy for too long and couldn't handle a smoothie..I bout this one after shopping around for weeks specifically for the metal drive shaft..my old one was plastic and melted..I got this one and made 2 smoothies, the blender works great but the smoothies were just not for me..maybe I'll try a milkshake since my Margarita days are behind me..it's very pretty though!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Not that loud (on toggle)
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps my previous Black & Decker blender dulled my ears, but I do not think this blender is loud at all. And it makes quick work of the frozen strawberries for my daily smoothie, much more quickly then my previous blender. I love the simplicity of the toggle switch and the convenient option to replace the jar with a standard (not wide mouth) mason jar so I can make dressings, dips, etc. directly into the container. Makes good pesto. Does not make good hummus. If I'm still happy with this in a few months to a year, I'll come back and switch this rating to five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ishmael

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a while...
customer_reviews.text: Performed well at making smoothies with frozen fruit, Margaritas, and other frozen beverages. After approximately 3 months of mild use by responsible owner the drive coupler was stripped. It seems a very bad engineering choice to have only a small screw responsible for handling 600 watts of power. The part that failed is not where the blender jar locks into the base, but the square peg that sits on the motor. This peg has a small screw hole in the bottom that was stripped extremely easily. A new piece may fix the blender, unless the screw on the motor is stripped. Hard to tell as of now. TLDR; worked well until the screw stripped. disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Technologist

customer_reviews.title: Great little blending monster.
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize it was only two speeds when I ordered it, my fault, but this thing will puree just about anything. It is almost scary. It has a stronger motor than my big Kitchen Aid mixer, almost double. If I ever need some torture tools on the fly, I know this will take a hand off easy. I like that the pitcher is glass too, I loathe plastic and it is very durable. I dropped it twice between the time I unpacked it to getting it washed and put away and not a scratch on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ross W. Virock

customer_reviews.title: Works well but it's very loud
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the loudest blender I have ever used. It works very well, but it is incredibly loud.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: It's a blender
customer_reviews.text: No special bells and whistles and just like in the old days, you HAVE to hold the lid down when you blend or it will go flying off. Also, the packaging was terrible as it clearly was a return and definitely not in brand new condition, nor packaged with any sort of care.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender, Great value. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great Blender, Powerful motor.Feels solid, Looks nice on counter top. Use it for smoothies, sauces and soups. What I also like is that you can buy different blades and can easily get replacement parts. My last blender was a Hamilton Beech and I had to throw away a perfectly good base with motor and glass jar because the bearings in the blade assembly were shot and not replaceable. Good value. Easily comparable to or better than higher priced alternatives. Well worth the money. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jerard K. Frech

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This little blender is a champ, esp. for a price. I've had it for several months now and use it probably once or twice a week. One area of concern is the faint smell of burning rubber when it runs. Hopefully, despite this, it will last for years!
customer_reviews.author: Alison B.

customer_reviews.title: VERY LOUD, but otherwise works well
customer_reviews.text: Very simple unit for juicing, works well. Switch has an on position and a boost position, which is faster. Solid drive mixes fruits/vegetables well. VERY LOUD. I read the other reviews saying this before but didn't think it would be this bad. I want ear plugs every time I'm in the kitchen with it. Because of this I would not purchase again or recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: New User

customer_reviews.title: Not good for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I have had this blender for 2 years now, so it does last, but I kinda wished it didn't. It is not a good smoothie maker. You need to stop it and stir it multiple times while making a smoothie. It gets air pockets. I will keep using it until it goes out, because I'm cheap, but will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: becky matson

customer_reviews.title: I love the retro look and heaviness of the glass container
customer_reviews.text: I love the retro look and heaviness of the glass container. Easy to disassemble and clean -- that was the major problem with my old plastic one. And having just two buttons is fine -- the 10 speeds on most blenders seems superfluous to me. This one gets the job done just fine.
customer_reviews.author: norwich urchin

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this blender
customer_reviews.text: So far (after about 2 months) this blender is a great improvement over the Braun blender with plastic gear connection that breaks easily. There is a metal gear attachment that seems much more capable to handle grinding larger ice cubes. I got the one with a toggle switch which so far is all I need. The toggle has a regular power-on setting (toggled up) and a pulse setting (toggled down).
customer_reviews.author: SRQ doc

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this product
customer_reviews.text: This product has a design defect. I use the blender once per day 7 days per week; that’s it. The plastic bases keep cracking; they last about a month to 6 weeks. At $5 apiece, after awhile you’ve paid for the blender over again. I’ve just bought a Vitamix so we’ll see how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: SHPDX73

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION:  Only if you're willing to wash the glass by hand.
customer_reviews.text: After light use making smoothies and sauces, maybe twenty times ever, the glass pitcher is cracked and has a chunk missing. Nothing was near it in the dishwasher. I suspect the heat and/or drying cycle caused this. VERY DISAPPOINTED. I was picking up little broken pieces of glass from the bottom of my dishwasher. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Verdadian

customer_reviews.title: Its garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst blender I have ever used, did not work properly from day one. They should be ashamed for making such a trash blender, it doesn't even deserve one star.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY WARNER

customer_reviews.title: Not the other one, this one.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good, powerful blender without all the extra stuff. Which is just what I wanted. Highly recommend if all you need is a basic blender without 27 other buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Mayworm

customer_reviews.title: Blends great, but lasted less than a year!
customer_reviews.text: Even though it's a great blender and makes perfect smoothies-- my sole reason for purchasing it-- I have to give it only four stars because it lasted less than a year. At the 10-month mark or so, the motor lost its mojo and started making purees instead of smoothies. The worst part? I'll probably have to buy another one because I've bought a few blenders from Costco (Ninja, Hamilton Beach and another Oster with a bunch of buttons) and had to return every one of them because they are not good as this one. I'm hoping #2 lasts a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: JJBooknut

customer_reviews.title: Motor stopped working after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in order to replace our other blender, which was the same one and lasted 3 years, but after two weeks of use, the motor of the blender stopped functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent M.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: It was a Mother’s Day gift and I don’t think they like it and it was very very late.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Washington

customer_reviews.title: Need to replace with metals
customer_reviews.text: The plastic screw piece on the glass part lasted only 6 uses before is split Do not but if you want to mAke bullet coffee
customer_reviews.author: cynthea bell

customer_reviews.title: Fine product.  Tough as nails.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing slows this baby down. The glass carafe is strong, sturdy, and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Loud, Blends Well
customer_reviews.text: Blending great thus far. But the sound is like a lawn mower in your kitchen. I've started wearing my ear buds when using it as ears were ringing after running for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jacarda

customer_reviews.title: but it just works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: well-made, old school Oster blender. Bought the Fusion blender blade, too. Yes it's louder than other blenders, but it just works like a champ. just two speeds? really not a problem, when you think about it. What do you want a blender to do? Blend stuff. Quickly and efficiently. This does it really well. Also bought the Blend-n-go cup for my wife's breakfast smoothie. That works well, too.
customer_reviews.author: just a guy

customer_reviews.title: I owned a previous model and it worked like a champ- blending frozen fruit for smoothies almost daily ...
customer_reviews.text: I owned a previous model and it worked like a champ- blending frozen fruit for smoothies almost daily for a few years. I even had to replace the blades twice because they became dull. It finally gave out so I ordered a new one. Within 2 weeks of owning the new one something broke inside the motor. Amazon was awesome and exchanged it for me. This one seems to be working fine so far, but it seems more cheaply made than the one I purchased a few years ago...so we will see. Though if it runs even half as well and as long as the first one, I will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Finally a quality blender!
customer_reviews.text: Recommend. I use it almost daily. Easy to use and powerful. Easy to clean and store also.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana M. cruz

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably Loud
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, but it is SO LOUD!! Loudest blender I've ever used. It takes much longer than it should to produce a smoothie, unless you add a LOT of liquid. Also, it gives off a bad burning smell, like the motor is working too hard or something. I will continue to use this for now, but would not buy another of this model.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Super Loud
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to assemble, use, and clean. The base is a bit bulky so it is harder to store or leave out in the counter. The motor is extremely loud. I actually recommend wearing ear muffs while using this blender or else your ears will ring for hours after use. It can crush ice fairly easily too. Overall, it is a good product that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Donn

customer_reviews.title: Love this Blender
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender. This replaced our old blender, which has broken twice. I like the glass container, and the easy toggle switch. Oster blenders have been around for decades, and the toggle switch is a part of their brand. It is loud, but fast. So if you can handle the noise, it is the blender to buy. Perfect for smoothies, Orange Julius', and cold soup.
customer_reviews.author: JennR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Per other users' advice
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Per other users' advice, I bought the fusion six-point fusion blade, and this pretty little beast noisily demolishes everything you dare put into its shark-mouth. Speaking of, I've read people here complaining about the noise it makes? YOU GUYS, IT'S A 600-WATT ALL-METAL BLENDER. It was born to be loud.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Minardi

customer_reviews.title: Not good for hot liquids but can be great if improved
customer_reviews.text: This blender is perfect for what I needed but the quality of the plastic base ruined it for me. I use it for my bulletproof coffee I make every morning but upon cleaning the cap that holds the blades I noticed that the plastic has cracked all around. I bought this because the glass jar and the All Metal Drive made it seem like it was good for hot liquids but I guess not.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny L.

customer_reviews.title: This is the finest blender we've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Oster BPCT02-BA0-000 6-Cup Glass Jar 2-Speed Toggle Beehive Blender, This is the finest blender we've ever owned!! We normally make 2 smoothies a day, which this one does extremely well and very fast. Most people don't need all the various speed buttons on a blender. Just get this one as it has the power to get the job done right!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Miller

customer_reviews.title: So far great
customer_reviews.text: I use it for grinding ice and so far it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Realalien

customer_reviews.title: Oster
customer_reviews.text: BLends finer than my ninja did on my green drinks. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Noonan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Third one and still the best, blades don’t last as older gens.
customer_reviews.author: MAURICIO A. WETTER

customer_reviews.title: Reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Good reliable blender. A little noisy. But 30 seconds a day is bearable. If you’re gonna be blending for longer you might consider something quieter.
customer_reviews.author: Margot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blender, with (much appreciated) extra power!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blender to replace an older Oster that I had for about 10 years, which was a 450-watt model. Over time, it seemed to be having a harder and harder time with my morning smoothies, which I make with frozen fruit. The new one that I purchased was listed at 600-watts, and the difference is like night and day! No problems with anything I have blended yet, even jars full of ice. One minor complaint, as other reviewers have pointed out, is the noise. This blender is quite loud, but that makes sense as it is sporting a more powerful motor. Overall an excellent blender, with quality construction and a very satisfying boost in power over other models.
customer_reviews.author: BBuotS

customer_reviews.title: Great power too much noise
customer_reviews.text: No much more to say. My wife was interested in this one because she knew it was a powerful blender. It is, but it is a very noisy machine.
customer_reviews.author: Ziweth

customer_reviews.title: Good durable blender for my smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Good durable blender for my smoothies. Learn the secret to getting into the bottom because the nut holding the motor fan on is not tightened enough at assembly and you will end up having to tighten it yourself when it lets the fan drop. Other than that it is tough.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any type of blending
customer_reviews.text: Very solid build, great power and strong jar. Works perfect for us. Just make sure this is what you are looking for, It has one jar and only type of blade.
customer_reviews.author: Abhinaw Sarang

customer_reviews.title: Good choice!
customer_reviews.text: I had Oster blender for thirty years. It was working just fine but looked so old. So I wanted a new blender for my green juice/smoothie. I compare between this one and other famous expensive blender. Housekeeping Choice and Consumer Report, both had same ratings for both of blenders. Difference was the price. My old Oster had ten different setting buttons that so difficult to clean between them. This new Oster has just a knob. Its super easy to clean. It makes perfect juice/smoothie every time. I am so happy that I made a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: mikazuki7344

customer_reviews.title: It is Loud
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but is so loud. It loud. Like, it's really loud. Why so loud?
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: great mixer
customer_reviews.text: every thing that should be metal is, so i expect this one will last through my ice crushing and smoothie making.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blends greats.  Smells like burning rubber
customer_reviews.text: Have used the blender for a while now. It chops and blends anything I have tried ( including ice ). Very simple user interface ( on, off, pulse ) When I run for more than 10 seconds it smells like burning rubber very faintly. Not sure if that was always or has started developing. In any case, it is still working great.
customer_reviews.author: wftimetraveler

customer_reviews.title: terrible and loud !
customer_reviews.text: I have to throw this out after the third time trying to use it. .. it literally couldn't even handle Daily Harvest Smoothy. And it was so loud it could be heard down the hallway. Spend more, do better.
customer_reviews.author: donna b.

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: worked twice and the motor blew on the third use. So this product did not meet our expectation at all
customer_reviews.author: Paraic Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: The blending it is excelent in que quality but extremely noisy you'll wake up the whole block in the mornings
customer_reviews.author: Blanca L

customer_reviews.title: The metal attachment ensures it wont break like the cheap plastic bottom of the old unit and ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a very cheap blender from Walmart. The metal attachment ensures it wont break like the cheap plastic bottom of the old unit and the blades ensure a consistently smooth blend.....its basically the smoothie machine of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jackdef

customer_reviews.title: Great but really loud.
customer_reviews.text: We mostly use ours for smoothies, pesto, salad dressing. So far, it works great. It's our second Oster so we expected to be pleased and we haven't been disappointed. It is very loud - be aware. That turns a lot of people off. But it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Bailey

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT.
customer_reviews.text: LOVED IT... until we cracked the pitcher making watermelon cocktails. WHY NOT MAKE A REPLACEMENT PITCHER MADE OF STAINLESS STEEL?
customer_reviews.author: [ sc'Que? ]

customer_reviews.title: Great for chopping and blending, but quite noisy
customer_reviews.text: It does chop and mix everything I throw at it. But my gosh is it loud! Will keep it but have to make sure I don't want to talk to anyone while it is on, and no one is sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: CJTH

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I just use this for bullet-proof coffee in the mornings. It's great for hot liquids, and blends well, although it is a bit loud. Not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M. Means

customer_reviews.title: Oster Beehive Blender running like new 3 yrs later
customer_reviews.text: The blender is used to make malts, placing the motor under an incredibly heavy load. Using short bursts of power ensures the motor does not overheat. In addition to malts we make taco sauce and run the blender on high for a minute or two to puree the ingredients with no problems at all. This is one of the best blenders I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic gasket cracked within a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Blender worked well for 2 weeks until the plastic gasket split causing liquid to spill onto counter. Ridiculous! Just received a free replacement plastic gasket and the blender still leaks everywhere! Not good!
customer_reviews.author: Weetam

customer_reviews.title: This Blender is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best Blender I have ever owned, don't spend hundreds just buy this I will put it up against any blender on the market. I love that it is simple there is a toggle switch up is pulse and down is on and wow baby this things blends. Took only about 2 seconds and every piece of Ice was completely blended, no chunks at the bottom. I would pay $100 bucks for this easy and yet it was less than $30 this is a no brainer people
customer_reviews.author: David Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Good, But Loud, But Good
customer_reviews.text: This blender is reliable. It handles ice well. It's also as good looking in person as in the picture. It's also really loud. I read some reviews -- and kind of thought, "Who expects a blender to be quiet?" But it is quite loud. I still like it because it does everything it's supposed to. But when I turn it on, I brace myself a little.
customer_reviews.author: Working Journalist

customer_reviews.title: Love this blender!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Ninja and a Magic Bullet before this blender. This blender outperforms both of them. I love it. It is so powerful and completely blends my fruit, veggies and ice. I use it everyday for smoothies and it has never disappointed me. I like the glass jar. It's tough and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CCWL

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: It only have two options, but works well. The blades are very sharp and it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: More powerful than my previous blender, and is definitely noticeable in how it works. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Glass Jar
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace 10 yr old Oster blender. Does the job, nice sturdy glass jar, does everything I want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Billion

customer_reviews.title: Oster blender review
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for smoothies. No need to spend more for fancy blenders in my opinion. This brand has been around for at least 50 years too. I still have an old one from when I was a child but it doesn't do smoothies as well but it works.
customer_reviews.author: doug

customer_reviews.title: Great blender! It is noisy
customer_reviews.text: Great blender! It is noisy, but they all are. I can set this on high and let it blend while I do other things. It makes a perfect smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: cliff thomas

customer_reviews.title: glass is untempered
customer_reviews.text: BE CAREFUL, the glass is untempered, I dropped the blender and needed six stitches. shattered into razor sharp edges that sliced through my hands like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best blender I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blender I have ever had! It is simple, clean, hard working, and looks great. No extra controls, just simple on and off and a surge, and that's all. Nice stainless steel and glass jar, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Retired and Happy

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to jinx anything by writing this review, but this blender has served me well since I received it (one month ago). I use it 6/7 days to make a smoothie for breakfast. I use frozen fruit (not ice) and occasionally the smoothie is thick and I have to stir it. Otherwise, it blends everything nicely. From time to time I can smell the engine "burning", but in a way that says "I'm working" not "I'm about to burst into flames". Overall, solid purchase. An attractive blender that does it's job, at a price you can't beat!
customer_reviews.author: nicole underhill

customer_reviews.title: but sounds like a 747 taking off
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but sounds like a 747 taking off. Really loud.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan81

product_meta.title: Oster BPCT02-BA0-000 6-Cup Glass Jar 2-Speed Toggle Beehive Blender, Brushed Stainless
product_meta.description: Timeless looks and powerful performance combine in one sleek machine. The Oster Beehive Blender has a classic toggle switch which controls two speeds and a whopping 600 watts of power. It’s got every blending possibility covered, from frozen drinks to dips, sauces to smoothies, and soup to nuts. The 6-cup glass jar has been Thermal Shock tested so you can pull it out of a steamy dishwasher and safely make a frosty cold beverage right away. The stainless steel “ice crusher” blade does just that so you get smooth frozen drinks every time. The Oster Beehive Blender is made in North America and backed by the superior quality of All Metal Drive. Because the two pieces that connect are metal (instead of plastic), you get a more durable and longer-lasting blender that will function flawlessly, party after party, year after year. Has a 1-year warranty.
feature_bullets: Oster 10 Year DURALAST All-Metal Drive Limited Warranty for lasting durability
6-Cup Boroclass Glass Jar is dishwasher safe for easy clean up
2-ounce filler cap has built in markings to measure and pour ingredients while blending
Crush Pro 4 Blade uses stainless steel, 4-point design to pulverize and chop with precision

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars749 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
